---
title: ""
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
listing:
  contents: posts/**/*.qmd
  sort: "date desc"
  type: grid
  grid-columns: 4
  image-height: 250px
  page-size: 12
  categories: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  fields: [image, date, title, description, categories, reading-time]
---

<style>
  /* 1. Header & Spacing Adjustments */
  .quarto-title-block, .page-columns {
    margin-top: -1.5rem !important; 
    padding-top: 0 !important;
  }

  /* 2. Badge Style */
  .badge-gradient {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5a9fd4 0%, #3a7fba 100%);
    color: #ffffff;
    padding: 0.5em 1.2em;
    border-radius: 50rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(90, 159, 212, 0.35);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
  }

  /* 3. Title Style */
  .header-title {
    font-weight: 800;
    color: #5a9fd4; 
    letter-spacing: -0.5px;
  }
  
  /* --- THE FIX START --- */
  
  /* 4. NUCLEAR OPTION: Hide the "Categories" title wherever it appears */
  h5.quarto-listing-category-title {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  /* 5. Style the Categories Container (now at the bottom) */
  .quarto-listing-category {
    margin-top: 50px !important;    
    padding-top: 30px !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #333;     
    text-align: center;             
    justify-content: center;
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 10px;
  }

  /* 6. Add our own cleaner label "EXPLORE TOPICS" at the bottom */
  .quarto-listing-category::before {
    content: "Explore Topics";
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: #888;
    font-weight: 600;
    letter-spacing: 1.5px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }
  /* --- THE FIX END --- */

</style>

<div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mb-2">
  <h1 class="m-0 p-0 header-title" style="font-size: 3rem;">
    My Blogs
  </h1>
  <span class="badge-gradient">
    14 Posts
  </span>
</div>

<p style="color: #c0c0c0; font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 300; margin-bottom: 2.5rem; margin-top: 0;">
  Deep dives into Agentic AI, MLOps, and Large Language Models.
</p>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  // 1. Find the main listing container
  const listing = document.getElementById("listing-listing");
  
  // 2. Select the category container (the pills)
  const categories = document.querySelector(".quarto-listing-category");

  // 3. Move it to the very end
  if (listing && categories) {
    listing.appendChild(categories);
  }
});
</script>
